sen.e: Tadazane was under the house arrest in Uji due to the one man retired Emperor Shirakawa's strong order and oppressive attitude towards the clan[family] eligible for regents and chancellor, however after the Emperor died, Tadazane took his political position back and worked hard to restore the authority of the family eligible for regents and chancellor under the supervision of the retired Emperor Toba.
